data.description: Newly remodeled rural home. Near 15 and not far from WalMart distribution Center. Wide open skies at night and the feeling of wide open spaces surround this home. New appliances, new paint, new granite counter tops, new flooring throughout. All walls are fully taped and textured to give the home a warm, comfortable, modern residential look and feel. The floor plan is open and the bedrooms are nicely sized. The driveway wraps around in a semi circle with two lockable gate entrances. This is the perfect property for the right person. A third of this large 2.44 acre lot is fully fenced. Indoor laundry area.Subject to cancellation of existing escrow-Buyer did not qualify.
